about_the_game:
This bonus DLC is dedicated to the Witch Chronicles.
The pack contains dark musical themes from previous games as well as scenes that are not included in the main game The Witch 4 and videos from the previous games.
Video clips from previous games have been upgraded to UltraHD resolution.
Locate the Bonus Package folder in your game directory.
Video:
  • Behind the scenes of a film set.mp4 - Cut scenes from Witch 4
  • Coven.mp4 - The final scene of The Witch 1
  • Black Sabbath.mp4 The final scene of The Witch 2
  • Fat chef.mp4 one scene from The Witch 2
  • Tlandzi.mp4 one of the endings Witch 3
  • Lilith.mp4 one of the endings Candle Daemon
  • Descending.mp4 one of the endings Witch 4
Sound:
  • Back to the witch's forest.mp3 03.38 (Witch 3)
  • Black Sabbath.mp3 - 02.29
  • Dark Ambient Hell1 - 02.23
  • Fat chef.mp3 - 02.34 (Witch 2)
  • Hungry clown.mp3 - 02.37 (Witch 2)
  • Forest witch them.mp3 - 01.56 (Witch 2)
  • Jester.mp3 - 02.32 (Jester`s Theater Museum)
  • Living flower.mp3 - 02.07 (Witch 4)
  • Love with a ghost.mp3- 03.12 (Witch 4)
  • Plague doctor.mp3 - 01.18 (Jester`s Theater Museum)
  • Resurrection of cenobites.mp3 - 03.50 (Witch 2)
  • Strange hotel.mp3 - 02.03 (Witch 4)
  • Tentacle.mp3 - 03.09 (Witch 4)
  • Void Demon.mp3 - 02.50 (Jester`s Theater Museum)

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC is intended for adults only. 
The DLC contains explicit adult themes including nudity, violence and sexual acts and group sex between monsters and sisters. Please use caution and make sure you are in a suitable location before playing so as not to cause a disturbance to others.
Content in this DLC includes, but is not limited to the following:
- BDSM
- Group sex
- Rough sex
- Tentacles
- Blowjob
- Masturbation
The game does not contain content such as heavy violence, drug abuse, or self harm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/11
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/11
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
